description:
[https://docs.sentry.io/api/organizations/retrieve-an-organization/](https://docs.sentry.io/api/organizations/retrieve-an-organization/)

Return details on an individual organization including various details such as membership access, features, and teams.

### Path Parameters

`organization_slug` *(string)*REQUIRED

The slug of the organization to look up.

### Scopes

You need to [authenticate via bearer auth token.](https://docs.sentry.io/api/auth) requires one of the following scopes:

*   `org: read`
